name: WKInterfaceTimer
desc: A label that displays a countdown or count-up timer.

items.name: func setDate(Date)
items.desc: Changes the start time for the timer.

items.name: func setTextColor(UIColor?)
items.desc: Sets the color of the timer’s text.

items.name: func start()
items.desc: Begins updates to the timer’s display.

items.name: func stop()
items.desc: Stops updates to the timer’s display.
